thread.title: UIA increases frequency en route Kiev – BeijingTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: UIA increases frequency en route Kiev – BeijingTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: UIA increases frequency en route Kiev – BeijingTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UIA increases frequency en route Kiev – Beijing Published on : Thursday, August 20, 2015
Effective April 26, 2016, UIA will be operating 5 non-stop weekly scheduled flights en route Kiev (Kiev Boryspil International airport) – Beijing (Beijing Capital International Airport) – Kiev (Kiev Boryspil International airport). The flights will be operated on modern Boeing 767 aircraft with three-class cabin configuration – Business Class, Premium Economy Class, and Economy Class.

“UIA keeps on developing the model of a transit carrier from west to east and from north to south, – noted Evgeniya Satska, UIA Corporate Press Secretary. – We regard the decision to increase frequency of our long-haul flights to Beijing to be both rational and consistent. We are confident that by intensifying our eastbound operations we will be able to fully use Ukraine`s transit potential and help turn Kiev Boryspil International airport into a huge and efficient hub”.
At Kiev Boryspil International airport UIA offers convenient connections from Amsterdam, Paris, Vilnius, Moscow, Istanbul, Tel Aviv, Chisinau, Tehran, Astana, Almaty, Yerevan, Baku, Tbilisi, as well as the cities of Ukraine to Beijing. The flights from Beijing are optimally connected to all UIA international and domestic services.
Source:- UIA
